text: Chryseobacterium gleum is a bacterium from the genus of Chryseobacterium which has been isolated from a high vaginal swab from a human in London in England. Chryseobacterium gleum can cause infections in humans. == References == == Further reading == * * * * * * * ==External links== *Type strain of Chryseobacterium gleum at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase gleum Category:Bacteria described in 1994
title: Chryseobacterium gleum
